name: A Watched Pot Never Boils Mobile Friendly
name_original: A Watched Pot Never Boils Mobile Friendly
description:
=How To Play=

it's simple. click the pot, don't get caught.

=The Intro=

Scratchy(Scratch Cat) was boiling some food for the good Scratchers and Scratch Cat want to make sure it does not over boil but you know, a watched pot never boils.
